s3.title: Amazon S3 Storage
s3.author: Frédéric Guillot
s3.description: This plugin stores uploaded files to Amazon S3 instead of storing files on the local file system.

assigncategory.title: Assign category when moving cards to specified column
assigncategory.author: David Morlitz
assigncategory.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to set the category on a card when moved to a specified column

assigndate.title: Assign date to undated cards
assigndate.author: David Morlitz
assigndate.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to set a due date on undated cards to allow card to appear on calendar and ICS feed

assignduedatecolumn.title: Assign due date when moving cards to specified column
assignduedatecolumn.author: Jacob Charles Wilson
assignduedatecolumn.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to set a due date (relative to the current time in days) on a card when moved to a specified column

autoemailactions.title: Auto Email Extended Actions
autoemailactions.author: Craig Crosby
autoemailactions.description: Add the automatic actions to Send a task by email to the creator or assignee of the task. Also, included are actions to send a notification via email when a task or subtask due date is impending within a duration or overdue.

autosubtasks.title: Auto Subtask Creation
autosubtasks.author: Craig Crosby
autosubtasks.description: Automatic action to create subtasks when a task is created or moves column.

Bak2topbotm.title: Bak2topbotm
Bak2topbotm.author: Craig Crosby
Bak2topbotm.description: Back to Top and Bottom Buttons for Task Summary

Boardcustomizer.title: Boardcustomizer
Boardcustomizer.author: BlueTeck, Craig Crosby, Jake G
Boardcustomizer.description: Customize board and card style per user

commentonly.title: Comment Only Restrictions for Project Viewers
commentonly.author: Craig Crosby
commentonly.description: Add Commenting abilities for Project Viewers.

CompletedComplexity.title: Completed Complexity
CompletedComplexity.author: Andrew Cziryak
CompletedComplexity.description: Plugin to add tracking of Completed Complexity of tasks over dates in a date range. This chart shows the completed complexity (throughput) of tasks moved into the right-most column over the time interval.

customizer.title: Customizer
customizer.author: Craig Crosby
customizer.description: GUI to add logos, themes, favicons and much more customization.

CustomUserCSS.title: CustomUserCSS
CustomUserCSS.author: Sebastian Pape
CustomUserCSS.description: Adds a setting for custom CSS per user

creecros_filter_pack.title: Creecros_Filter_Pack
creecros_filter_pack.author: Craig Crosby
creecros_filter_pack.description: Creecros Filter Pack. Request new filters on issue board.

MarkdownPlus.title: MarkdownPlus
MarkdownPlus.author: Craig Crosby
MarkdownPlus.description: Improved Markdown, with check boxes, emoji shortcode, inline html, etc...

group_assign.title: Group_assign
group_assign.author: Craig Crosby, Jake G
group_assign.description: Add group assignment and additional assignees multiselect option to tasks.

Task2pdf.title: Task2pdf
Task2pdf.author: Craig Crosby
Task2pdf.description: Create a printer friendly PDF of a task.

ThemeRevision.title: ThemeRevision
ThemeRevision.author: greyaz
ThemeRevision.description: A 'task-first' and high-quality theme for Kanboard. It's aimed at better mobile experiences, common plugins' compatibilities, and customization friendly.

EmbedAnything.title: Embed Anything
EmbedAnything.author: greyaz
EmbedAnything.description: Embed anything into Kanboard. This plugin utilizes HTML iframes and allows you to embed any web content into your project as a stand-alone page.

WechatWorkNotifier.title: Wechat Work Notifier
WechatWorkNotifier.author: greyaz
WechatWorkNotifier.description: Receive notifications on Wechat Work (企业微信), aka Wecom.

backlog.title: Backlog
backlog.author: vistree + creecros
backlog.description: Plugin to add a backlog column with full height to project board.

bigboard.title: Bigboard
bigboard.author: BlueTeck, Thomas Stinner, Pierre Cadeot, PapeCoding, Chaosmeister, Jieiku
bigboard.description: A Kanboard that can display multiple projects.

bitbucket-webhook.title: Bitbucket Webhook
bitbucket-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
bitbucket-webhook.description: Bind Bitbucket webhook events to Kanboard automatic actions.

cardpushdate.title: Card Push Date - and other actions
cardpushdate.author: David Morlitz
cardpushdate.description: Put easy actions on task cards, searches and dashboard - including update card date, show comments, edit, close and move card

db-storage.title: Database Storage
db-storage.author: Frédéric Guillot
db-storage.description: This plugin stores uploaded files into the database instead of using the local filesystem.

coverimage.title: Coverimage
coverimage.author: BlueTeck + creecros
coverimage.description: This plugin adds a coverimage function to tasks on the board, and allows you to set a project image to use as a logo for projects.

duedate.title: Due Date sorting
duedate.author: David Morlitz
duedate.description: Allow boards to be sorted by card due date

essential.title: Essential
essential.author: Valentino Pesce
essential.description: Essential theme returns a new style to your kanboard.

encryptedcontent.title: EncryptedContent
encryptedcontent.author: Valentino Pesce
encryptedcontent.description: This plugin allows the insertion of text content encrypted in the kanboard database, with the use of random keys.

extendedMail.title: extendedMail
extendedMail.author: Rens Sikma
extendedMail.description: Adds extra functionality to kanboard comment by email

gantt.title: Gantt
gantt.author: Frédéric Guillot
gantt.description: Gantt charts for tasks and projects.

gitea-webhook.title: Gitea Webhook
gitea-webhook.author: Chris Metz
gitea-webhook.description: Connect Gitea webhook events to Kanboard automatic actions.

github-webhook.title: Github Webhook
github-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
github-webhook.description: Connect Github webhook events to Kanboard automatic actions.

github-release-notifier.title: Github Release Notifier
github-release-notifier.author: Shaun Fong
github-release-notifier.description: Kanboard Plugin to create task when github release.

gitlab-webhook.title: Gitlab Webhook
gitlab-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
gitlab-webhook.description: Connect Gitlab webhook events to Kanboard automatic actions.

gogs-webhook.title: Gogs Webhook
gogs-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
gogs-webhook.description: Connect Gogs webhook events to Kanboard automatic actions.

Greenwing.title: Greenwing
Greenwing.author: Confexion
Greenwing.description: Greenwing is a kanboard beautify theme with a modern design.

highlightcodesyntax.title: HighlightCodeSyntax
highlightcodesyntax.author: Valentino Pesce
highlightcodesyntax.description: For code snippets the plugin is able to highlight code syntax in more than 151 languages, including PHP, Javascript, Python, HTML and CSS.

imapuserauth.title: IMAP User Authentication
imapuserauth.author: Jim Mason
imapuserauth.description: Login to Kanboard using your IMAP credentials

importwithgroup.title: ImportWithGroup
importwithgroup.author: Craig Crosby
importwithgroup.description: Adds a group name field to Import via CSV.

instantactions.title: Instant Actions for Kanboard Tasks
instantactions.author: Jens Heuschkel
instantactions.description: Add buttons to tasks in board view for edit, delete and close them.

jabber.title: Jabber
jabber.author: Frédéric Guillot
jabber.description: Receive individual or project notifications on Jabber.

kangaroojump.title: KangarooJump
kangaroojump.author: Valentino Pesce
kangaroojump.description: You can switch from one task to another by entering number on any page of your Kanboard.

mailgun.title: Mailgun
mailgun.author: Frédéric Guillot
mailgun.description: Use the Mailgun API to send emails and create tasks from emails.

matrix.title: Matrix
matrix.author: Chris Metz
matrix.description: Send Kanboard notifications to Matrix Synapse (federated messaging platform).

mattermost.title: Mattermost
mattermost.author: Frédéric Guillot
mattermost.description: Send Kanboard notifications to Mattermost (self-hosted Slack clone).

metadata.title: Metadata Manager
metadata.author: BlueTeck
metadata.description: This plugin adds a GUI to manage custom metadata for task, projects and user.

metamagik.title: metaMagik
metamagik.author: Craig Crosby + BlueTeck
metamagik.description: Custom Fields and advanced GUI for managing them, along with Metadata Manager

milestone.title: Milestone
milestone.author: Olivier Maridat
milestone.description: Add a section for milestones to show their related tasks.

moveondate.title: Move cards to specific columns when due date passed
moveondate.author: David Morlitz
moveondate.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to move cards to a specific column when the due date has passed

moon.title: Moon
moon.author: Valentino Pesce
moon.description: Theme with a modern design that adds syntax highlighting for Markdown code, compatible with the Customizer plugin.

nebula.title: Nebula
nebula.author: Valentino Pesce
nebula.description: Theme with a modern design that adds syntax highlighting for Markdown code, compatible with the Customizer plugin.

overwrite_translation.title: Overwrite Translation
overwrite_translation.author: BlueTeck
overwrite_translation.description: Overwrite default translations without touching kanboard files.

oxygen.title: Oxygen
oxygen.author: Valentino Pesce
oxygen.description: Replaces the logo and adds syntax highlighting for Markdown code.

pushdate.title: Push out due date on cards when moving to specific columns
pushdate.author: David Morlitz
pushdate.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to push the due date a specified number of days when moving cards to a specific column

quabdd.title: QuaBDD
quabdd.author: Quamob
quabdd.description: This plugin give you an new interface that help you create Gherkin tests for a task.

quacicd.title: QuaCICD
quacicd.author: Quamob
quacicd.description: This plugin allow you to execute automated deployment in qualification and production directly on your board.

registration.title: Self-Registration
registration.author: Frédéric Guillot
registration.description: Self-registration plugin to allow people to sign up on Kanboard.

signal.title: Signal
signal.author: Benedikt Hopmann
signal.description: Receive Kanboard notifications on Signal (via signal-cli).

spectre.title: Spectre Theme
spectre.author: Viggo
spectre.description: Modern And Simple CSS Theme For Kanboard

relationgraph.title: Relationgraph
relationgraph.author: BlueTeck, Xavier Vidal
relationgraph.description: Show relations between tasks using a graph library

rocketchat.title: RocketChat
rocketchat.author: Frédéric Guillot, Olivier Maridat
rocketchat.description: Receive individual or project notifications on RocketChat.

slack.title: Slack
slack.author: Frédéric Guillot
slack.description: Receive individual or project notifications on Slack.

timetrackingeditor.title: Time Tracking Editor
timetrackingeditor.author: Stinnux
timetrackingeditor.description: Manually Add and Edit Time Tracking entries, add comments and select billable/not billable to time tracking entries. Export Time Tracking Entries as HTML

TimeMachine.title: Plugin to add time machine : Back to the Future
TimeMachine.author: Yohann Valentin
TimeMachine.description: Add more analytics times datas like time comparison by swimlanes, categories and by dates(only spent time). And a edit form on subtask time tracking

starredprojects.title: Starred Projects
starredprojects.author: BibLibre
starredprojects.description: Mark projects as favorite for faster access in dashboard

soundnotification.title: SoundNotification
soundnotification.author: Valentino Pesce
soundnotification.description: Each new notification will sound an alert sound.

subtaskdate.title: SubtaskDueDate
subtaskdate.author: Manuel Raposo & Craig Crosby
subtaskdate.description: This plugin adds a Due Date to subtasks.

subtaskdescription.title: SubtaskDescription
subtaskdescription.author: Shaun Fong
subtaskdescription.description: This plugin add markdown description to subtasks.

synologychat.title: SynologyChat
synologychat.author: Paul Sweeney
synologychat.description: Receive individual or project notifications on Synology Chat.

timeintervalbutton.title: Task Interval Button
timeintervalbutton.author: Igor Mroz
timeintervalbutton.description: Simple plugins which adds button to incrementally change time spent on task.

comment-tooltip.title: Comment Tooltip
comment-tooltip.author: Enrico Frigo
comment-tooltip.description: Show task's comments as tooltip as in older kanboard version.

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.author: Manu Varkey
telegram.description: Receive individual or project notifications on Telegram.

updatenotifier.title: UpdateNotifier
updatenotifier.author: Valentino Pesce
updatenotifier.description: What is Update Notifier? The Update Notifier is a utility that scans installed plugin and displays a list of updates.

WeKanboard.title: WeKanboard
WeKanboard.author: Benno Waldhauer
WeKanboard.description: Yet another theme for Kanboard. Strongly inspired by the style of Wekan. Supports the Customizer plugin.

weightedvoting.title: Weighted voting
weightedvoting.author: Manel Perez
weightedvoting.description: This plugin add new features to Kanboard. Weighted voting for the evaluation of group activities in Kanboard.

AttachDocumentsforViewers.title: Attach Documents for Project Viewers
AttachDocumentsforViewers.author: Franklin Hernandez
AttachDocumentsforViewers.description: This plugin will allow Project Viewers to attach documents to tasks.

zulip.title: Zulip
zulip.author: Peter Fejer
zulip.description: Receive individual or project notifications on Zulip.

offline.title: Offline
offline.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
offline.description: This Plugin is used to automatically alert users when they've lost internet connectivity.

search.title: Search plugin
search.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
search.description: This Plugin is created for advanced fulltext search within all Projects. The search will be performed in Task title, Task description, Task comments, Subtask title and in Attachments. All 5 filters can be turned on/off in Kanboard Settings page.

CommentActions.title: Comment Actions
CommentActions.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
CommentActions.description: This plugin gives the ability to assign actual Task (direct in comment-create section) to one of the users in Project.

TaskButtonsReposition.title: Task Buttons reposition
TaskButtonsReposition.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
TaskButtonsReposition.description: By this Plugin some action buttons are duplicated from sidebar list to corresponding accordion section in Task content view.

KanboardProjectInvitation.title: Project Invitation
KanboardProjectInvitation.author: Andrei Volgin / Hussein Khalil, ipunkt Business Solutions
KanboardProjectInvitation.description: Plugin is used to invite new users to actual Project by typing user's email. Input for invitation is located in Project Settings->Permissions.

GrabScroll.title: GrabScroll
GrabScroll.author: Ramón Cahenzli
GrabScroll.description: Click and drag anywhere on your Kanboard to scroll horizontally.

SortBoardByDates.title: Sort Board By Dates for kanboard
SortBoardByDates.author: Manfred Hoffmann
SortBoardByDates.description: Allows boards to be sorted by different dates Date due, started, created, modified, moved, closed ... or (of course) in kanboard default-mode)

TaskProgressBar.title: TaskProgressBar
TaskProgressBar.author: Valentino Pesce
TaskProgressBar.description: Show the progress bar of sub-tasks from the bulletin board.

Outlook.title: Recieve Notification in Outlook
Outlook.author: Siddharth Kaul
Outlook.description: Get all the event notification in the outlook as an incoming webhook email.

WeeklyRecurringTasks.title: Duplicate Tasks by nightly Cron Job
WeeklyRecurringTasks.author: Sebastian Pape, Sebastien Diot
WeeklyRecurringTasks.description: Automatically clones Tasks with the DAILY/WEEKLY/BIWEEKLY or MONDAY/TUESDAY/WEDNESDAY/THURSDAY/FRIDAY/SATURDAY/SUNDAY tag

Group_owners.title: Group_owners
Group_owners.author: Cyboulette
Group_owners.description: Allows application managers to create and manage their groups by themselves.

KanboardEssentials.title: Kanboard Essentials
KanboardEssentials.author: Taeluf
KanboardEssentials.description: Adds many quality of life features, like edit buttons on columns & cards, among others.

PersianBoard.title: Persian Board
PersianBoard.author: Hamid Kord
PersianBoard.description: Make Kanboard compatible with Iranian Calendar (Persian or jalali Calendar) and support RTL (Right To Left) direction.

KADIFF.title: Activity Diff
KADIFF.author: Tomas Dittmann
KADIFF.description: Show a side-by-side diff (if applicable) in the activity streams

TNID.title: Task number in details
TNID.author: Tomas Dittmann
TNID.description: Show the task number in the task details, so if you use the MinimizeSidebar plugin, you can still see the tasknumber

CCIT.title: clickable checkboxes in textareass
CCIT.author: Tomas Dittmann
CCIT.description: Enable state-saving checkboxes in textareas - requires MarkdownPlus

PITM.title: Paste image to markdown
PITM.author: Tomas Dittmann
PITM.description: Allow to paste images directly into textareas at the caret position - requires MarkdownPlus

EAR.title: Enable attachment renaming
EAR.author: Tomas Dittmann
EAR.description: Add a button on attachments that allows you to rename them

RCB.title: Resizable codeblocks
RCB.author: Tomas Dittmann
RCB.description: Make codeblocks resizable, scrollable and also initially limit their height to 200px

mathjaxForKanboard.title: Add MathJax to Kanboard
mathjaxForKanboard.author: Michael Zauner
mathjaxForKanboard.description: Adds MathJax capabilites to your Kanboard. Use $$ \alpha $$  for inline math and $$$ \beta $$$ for block math

PAM.title: Project activity modifier
PAM.author: Tomas Dittmann
PAM.description: Add hide/show and delete buttons for administrators to every event on activity streams

ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn.title: ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn
ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn.author: Manfred Hoffmann
ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn.description: Adds an automatic action, that allows you to clear the due date of tasks in a specific column, that haven't been moved during a given period.

TaskAssignPriorityToCategory.title: TaskAssignPriorityToCategory
TaskAssignPriorityToCategory.author: Manfred Hoffmann
TaskAssignPriorityToCategory.description: Adds an automatic action to assign a priority based on a category.

AutomaticActionUX.title: AutomaticActionUX
AutomaticActionUX.author: aljawaid
AutomaticActionUX.description: This plugin gives the Automatic Action interface a complete makeover to make it more user friendly. Particularly useful for visual learners and non-English speaking users, this plugin adds a quick glance of Actions on the board avoiding careless drag-happy mistakes.

KanboardEmailHistory.title: KanboardEmailHistory
KanboardEmailHistory.author: aljawaid
KanboardEmailHistory.description: Action to email the full history of a task on closure

AgileIndicators.title: AgileIndicators
AgileIndicators.author: aljawaid
AgileIndicators.description: Agile Indicators display the measurements for Task Priorities and Task Complexities in an easy to use general format. Task Priorities are scaled between P1 and P5 whilst Task Complexities are scored as 0-50.

KanboardSupport.title: KanboardSupport
KanboardSupport.author: aljawaid
KanboardSupport.description: Add a support section in the Kanboard Settings interface so that end users can easily gather any information required by their internal technical support departments and for troubleshooting purposes.

Glancer.title: Glancer
Glancer.author: aljawaid
Glancer.description: Glancer lets you quickly jump to a project, task or comment through a search bar at the bottom of the screen. Following the Getting Things Done methodology, productive users can glance in and out of tasks, comments and projects across the interface.

KanboardPermalink.title: KanboardPermalink
KanboardPermalink.author: Theobald Software GmbH, aljawaid
KanboardPermalink.description: Adds a convenient link to copy the task url to the clipboard
